page.title: 08SEATON COURT (2)
page.content: {Seaton Court,}just off Fishmoor Drive, is an old people's home. It is quite a large building that occupies thirty-seven people. The age range that is accepted is from 65 to 90 years old. They live there for the rest of their lives and if they are too ill they go to a nursing-home. In the morning, the warden calls everyone on the intercom,and goes round to check that everyone is well. To occupy themselves the old people go out shopping, clean themselves or look after the house. They go out for outings twice a year and ten concerts are held in a year. The old people are kept very warm and comfortable because of the helpful staff. If we were old we would like to spend the rest of our lives there.
